properties.title: River Cruise
properties.description: 100 pesos ang adult fee para sa river cruise. 50 pesos kapag bata at estudyante. Mga 30 minutes to one hour yung buong cruise. May ipe-play na audio ng kasaysayan ng Vigan tapos sakto dun sa madadaanang stops na may mga statue sa gilid ng ilog. recommended on a sunny with some clouds kind of day. bring water because mainit. wala masyadong hangin sa river

properties.title: Calle Crisologo
properties.description: malaking part ng street ang preserved pa yung cobble stones na madadaanan. pwedeng mag-rent ng mga kalesa for 150 pesos per hour. may mga antique at souvenir shops sa calle na ito.

properties.title: Paoay Church
properties.description: One of the old baroque style churches in the Philippines

properties.title: Maira-ira Beach
properties.description: also known as blue lagoon. maraming activities na pwedeng gawin dito like zipline, banana boat, beach volleyball, etc.

properties.title: Timmangtang Rock
properties.description: may rock lang na sinlaki ng bahay sa coast/gilid ng road.

properties.title: Shipwreck along the Pan-Philippine Highway
properties.description: see older pic. need to confirm if it is the same shipwreck. may shock factor guys

properties.title: Patapat Viaduct
properties.description: bridge sa gilid ng daan kasi wala nang mapaglagyan ng daan! k!

properties.title: Taggat Lagoon
properties.description: may hinuli silang malaking isda. community chorvalu ang sayaaa

properties.title: Sentinela Cove
properties.description: cove na masarap tambayan! very clean! may part na super tago na maliit na cove. fine sand.
